summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1672, for the improvement of the alley in Block 20 of an Addition to the Town (now City) of Seattle as laid off on the claim of C. D. Boren, A. A. Denny and H. L. Yesler, being the alley from Madison Street to Spring Street, between Third Avenue and Fourth Avenue, by grading and paving the same with vitrified brick, laid on a proper concrete foundation, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 17686, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
